channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: GAA
channel.desc: Sarah Mulkerrins presents full match coverage of the All-Ireland Hurling final between Cork and Tipperary from a sold-out Croke Park in Dublin. It's one of the standout days in the Irish sporting calendar and is steeped in history, pride and fierce rivalry. Sarah is joined in the studio by Neil McManus and All-Ireland winners Paul Murphy and S?amus Flanagan. Commentary is by Thomas Niblock and Jamesie O'Connor, with pitch-side updates from Mark Sidebottom, S?amus Callanan and Se?n ?g ? hAilp?n.
